name: Square (Falcon13)
description:
Square  a random 2D game, made in 4 hours  :). With randomly generated levels. Hit as many balls as you can to earn points and buy power ups, skins...

*Disclaimer : It was really made in 4 hours (a little bit over) so don't expect much. And there will be future update to improve it. And Yes I know It looks like Balls (A 2D Game made by a famous youtuber named Dani). That is all I can think of in 4 hours :)

Have Fun ! And leave your feedback down in the comments :)
